data.title: The Poseidon Adventure (1972) Original Movie Posters
data.meta_description: The Poseidon Adventure (1972) Original Movie Posters at Posteritati, New York. The most authoritative collection of original movie posters from classic Hollywood to contemporary art-house. Shop online or visit our New York gallery. Over 40,000 original movie poster images archived. Est. 1995
